Text: Hi, could you help me with my order?
I received the wrong item. What should I do?
My product arrived damaged. I want a replacement.
My package never arrived. What’s the next step?
My order is delayed. Can you speed it up?
Your service is terrible—I want a refund.
Can you extend my return window by a few days?
I need to change my delivery address before it ships.
Please cancel my order before it is dispatched.
Can I pay to upgrade to faster shipping?
I’m outside the return period—can I still get a refund?
I need an exchange for a different size/color.
The packaging was damaged—can I get a partial refund?
The price dropped after I bought it. Will you price-match?
My discount code isn’t working. Can you help?
My payment keeps failing. What can I do?
My account is locked. How can I regain access?
I sent a gift to the wrong address—what can I do?
Please cancel my subscription and confirm.
Your service is f***ing terrible.
If you don’t fix this duplicate charge today, I’ll file a chargeback.
I’ve waited long enough—escalate this missing package to a manager now.
Refund me today or I’ll post this everywhere on social media.
Your policy says no, but I expect an exception—make it happen.
I didn’t approve this auto-renew—refund it or I cancel everything permanently.
Delivery is late—I want compensation and upgraded shipping now.
Send the correct item overnight—today—or I’ll return all of it.
Don’t ask for endless proof—just replace my broken item now.
Price dropped—match it today or I’ll buy from your competitor.
Hiding behind policy isn’t acceptable—approve my refund today.
My account is blocked—skip the nonsense and unlock me now.
Courier missed pickup again—book a new slot today and confirm.
Either give a partial refund for damage or I return everything.
Customs fee wasn’t disclosed—reimburse it now, no excuses.
Remove signature-on-delivery today or cancel and refund.
Your last agent was rude—transfer me to a supervisor who can fix this.
Preorder delays again—compensate me or cancel with full refund.
Send the return label now—I won’t pay to ship this back.
This is f***ing ridiculous—refund me right now.
If you don’t resolve this unauthorized charge, I’ll involve my bank and a lawyer.
Change the address immediately—don’t ship it to the wrong place.
I used it once and it failed—refund me despite your policy.
Stop making me wait for ‘investigation’—replace it now.
Pause my subscription today or refund the latest charge.
I already sent photos and receipts—don’t ask for more, just act.
Put me in a priority queue and confirm the timeline.
Resolve this today or I’ll leave a detailed negative review.
I want a manager call me back within one hour.
Quote the exact policy clause—and then approve my exception.
Return window ends today—authorize my late return anyway.
Cancel everything now with no fees and confirm in writing.
I expect an apology and store credit today for this mess.
Reroute the parcel that’s already in transit to my new address today.
Verify me quickly—stop the endless security hoops.
Multiple orders are wrong—process a bulk refund now.
You have 24 hours before I dispute this with my bank.
Give me credit today or ship a replacement overnight—your choice.
Wrong color—keep it simple: compensate me today.
Your system glitch caused this—own it and compensate me.
Hold the shipment at the depot now—I’ll pick it up myself.
